concept.title: Code Engine Hosts
concept.shortdesc: This page displays the hosts associated with the Helion Development Platform Code Engine only if HDP Code Engine was installed in a environment prior to upgrading to

conbody.p: The Operations Console supports Helion Development Platform Code Engine only if it was installed in a environment prior to upgrading to . If the HDP Code Engine was installed, the hosts associated with Helion Code Engine will be displayed on the this page.
Code Engine is a Continuous Integration service that automates build, test, and deploy steps to streamline the software release and quality assurance processes.
For more information, see the HPE Helion Development Platform 2.0: Code Engine Operations Guide.
